In this list of emails, we'll explore how to improve the above email, and how to create a more effective approach to reaching out to potential contacts.

## Email 1

### What's Wrong

- Longwinded introductory paragraph
- Little information about what they are asking
- Is the ship going to pick them up or do they have to go to a terminal
- No mention of price expectations

### How To Improve

- Condense the introduction by only including the information that is important
- Add a clear expectation of what they want from the recipient
- Add expected FIO quote
- Provide specific information about the pricing so they know what they are working with
Email 4:
You have found my name on a shippers website. Thank you for your inquiry, but I'm looking for something else.
<Email 3>:
Hi Charles,
Thanks for your email, but the market right now is focused on spot trades, and contracts with a short duration of 3-6 months.
Looking forward to working with you again,
Tony

## Email 2

### What's Wrong

- The recipient doesn't know what the sender is trying to convey
- The sender is vague in their request
- Has no idea about any relevant information

### How To Improve

- Start with the end in mind by clearly stating what the request is and what the time frame for the request is
- Offer something in return such as an FIO quote

Live chat

Another way to send email and get a response quickly is by using live chat. This is an instant messaging service that allows you to send messages to people who are online at the same time as you. This is especially helpful when you need to quickly get a response from someone but don't have time to wait for them to get back to you via email.

To use live chat, you'll need to download a client like WhatsApp or Google Hangouts. Once installed, simply click on the 'Chat' button and enter the person's username or phone number into the 'Chat with' field. You'll then be able to type out a message and send it off.

#### Just Read Emails from the “Inbox” of One Account, Automatically with Jsemail

Jsemail is a library to get emails from Gmail or Outlook inbox as Python dictionary or CSV files. Jsemail also runs on Windows and macOS (for Outlook), and it is independent of any GUI tool like Thunderbird. Jsemail can be easily extended to work with other email services.

Jsemail is written as Jupyter Notebook and available on GitHub. Just install the requirements and run Jsemail jupyter notebook. You can either email the generated report or copy the contents.

```
Dear Mr. Weich,

 Regards, 
 James
```

类似的邮件可以代替长篇之邮件。 
 下面列举五个最常见的邮件标题，其作用是：
（一）认可和恭维对方
```
```
```
I am delighted to hear from you. 
 I am pleased to receive your message. 
 I will be delighted to receive your reply to my letter.
```
```
（二）暗示
```
```
I am looking forward to hearing from you. 
 I look forward to receive your reply soon. 
 I look forward to meeting you soon.
```
```
（三）期待对方的合作
```
```
I would be pleased to cooperate with you.
Email 4:
Dear Mr. Weich,                   It is a great pleasure to know that you are interested in my company. 

Our leading products include: cement, powder paint, water treatment agent, etc. 

For your requirement of inquiry, you can also check with the following website:
http://www.crane.chem/
I look forward to establishing business cooperation with you! 
My best regards,                   Fiona
```
（四）交代
```
Thank you for your interest. 
 You needn't reply to me again as we can solve all our matters by phone. 
```
```
（五）谈及工作或前期的设想
```
```
I have to leave early this morning. 
 I shall be in Athens next week. 
 Next month, I will be on tour to Brazil. 
```
